name: I am pet
description:
You’ve always wanted a pet, but your parents would never allow it, the spoilsports. Well now you’re in luck! Look who has just appeared in your bedroom and is starting at you with those adorable massive eyes. Sure, it doesn’t look like any pet you’ve seen before, but beggars can’t be choosers, right? Better not to ask too many questions.

RESPOND to its needs! DON’T let things get out of hand! KEEP IT ALIVE!

 

Controls:

Click on an option button to interact with pet. Click and drag items onto pet to change its appearance.

Made for Ludum Dare 46 in 72 hours with the theme 'Keep It Alive'. All visual and sound assets, text sorter/generator etc created from scratch by the team during the jam. We would really appreciate if you tried it out and gave us a rating for the contest here . Thanks!

A game created by The Notepad Blood Pact Gang 

Jo Godfrey – Programming/Mechanics

Samuel Hollywood-Summers – Sound/Music  

Fraser Mackenzie – Programming/Design

Jack Sanderson Thwaite – Script/Story
